member.name: D3D11_COMPUTE_SHADER_TRACE_DESC
member.summary: Describes an instance of a compute shader to trace.

member.name: D3D11_COMPUTE_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.Invocation
member.summary: The invocation number of the instance of the compute shader.

member.name: D3D11_COMPUTE_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.ThreadIDInGroup
member.summary: The SV_GroupThreadID to trace. This value identifies indexes of individual threads within a thread group that a compute shader executes in.

member.name: D3D11_COMPUTE_SHADER_TRACE_DESC.ThreadGroupID
member.summary: The SV_GroupID to trace. This value identifies indexes of a thread group that the compute shader executes in.
